body:
Who's the girl beside Sakura at page 37? I don't remember her being part of the team. Is that supposed to be fatty-chan? So does this mean that the team of Michiru only agreed to be Furin's sparring partner as they want to taste the beautiful members of the team. Michuru being good friends with them now that she's having a sleepover with them but she witnessed the assault made by her teams coach, assist coast and trainer thus she also got raped. Well, this is just my hypothesis so don't take it seriously.
Anyways...WHERE'S THE DEFLORATION TAG?!
this is now my favorite MAJOR doujin
kinda shocking how good this is
